text: William James Bordill (born 24 July 1993 in Sandbach) is a Scottish rugby union player who plays for the Ayr RFC at the Loose Forward position. He formerly played for Glasgow Warriors.http://www.walesonline.co.uk/sport/rugby/rugby-news/full-list-ins- outs-every-11676414 Bordill played for Glasgow Warriors from 2013-16. When not involved in Warriors duty, Bordill played for Ayr RFC. He has represented Scotland at various age grades and at Club XV. In 2016 he was released by the Warriors. Bordill now solely plays for Ayr.http://www.walesonline.co.uk/sport/rugby/rugby-news/full-list-ins-outs- every-11676414 ==References== ==External links== * Will Bordill Glasgow Warriors profile Category:1993 births Category:Living people Category:Scottish rugby union players Category:Glasgow Warriors players Category:Ayr RFC players Category:Sale Sharks players Category:People from Sandbach Category:Scotland Club XV international rugby union players
title: Will Bordill
